author: darcius
content: <@!291925846556540928> Many thanks for creating this channel and getting the discussions going. Being able to have ownership models for withdrawal credentials today baked into a smart contract would be an absolute game changer imo. At Rocket Pool it's our single biggest centralising issue that could be solved entirely with this approach, so we'd be more than happy to help out with it wherever we're able <:simpsonhappy:405668432147775488>
